sentences.en: Do stand up straight, don't loll about like that!
sentences.cn: 站直, 别那样歪七竖八的!

sentences.en: Dog : My sweat gland is on my tongue. I must loll it out to lower the temperature.
sentences.cn: 我的汗腺长在我的舌头上, 我必须把舌头伸出来降温.

sentences.en: Don't loll about in the street after school.
sentences.cn: 放学后不要在街上到处闲逛.

sentences.en: He was lolling on the sofa in the shadows near the fire.
sentences.cn: 他懒洋洋地躺在炉火边一个背光的沙发上。

sentences.en: Just loll there: quiet dusk: let everything rip.
sentences.cn: 只消懒洋洋地享受这宁静的黄昏,一切全听其自然.

sentences.en: Next time don't loll out your tongue out.
sentences.cn: 下次可别伸出舌头来嘲笑人了.

sentences.en: Price cut inevitable as new crop available soon loll off until notice.
sentences.cn: 新的谷物即将上市,价格降低在所难免,请稳住另候通知.

sentences.en: The dog let its tongue loll out.
You shouldn't have so many guests in front loll out tongue.
sentences.cn: 你不该在这么多的客人面前伸舌头.

trans.tran_en: to sit or lie in a very lazy and relaxed way

trans.tran_cn: 懒洋洋地躺着[坐着、站着]，（头、舌等耷拉，下垂），懒洋洋地坐着（或躺着、站着），无所事事
